---
category: news
title: "Mother plucker: Steel fingers guided by AI pluck weeds rapidly and autonomously"
excerpt: "To pinpoint plants it needs to pluck, the Ekobot uses an AI-powered machine vision system trained to identify weeds as it rolls above the farm field. Once the weeds are within its sights, the robot uses a series of metal fingers to quickly dig up and push weeds out of the dirt."
